snippet: And then there were nine. The Preakness field continues to be in flux as two more horses defected: Vyjack (18th in the Kentucky Derby) and Normandy Invasion (fourth). Perhaps we will see one or two additions in the next day or two.
abstract: And then there were nine. The Preakness field continues to be in flux as two more horses defected: Vyjack (18th in the Kentucky Derby) and Normandy Invasion (fourth). Perhaps we will see one or two additions in the next day or two.

headline.main: Preakness Field Dwindles as Contenders Complete Works
